page.title: 05People's Attitudes
page.content: The growing prevalence of{vandalism} and{graffiti}shows a lack of respect by some young people towards others. Road signs, public buildings, street lamps, telephone boxes, all suffer damage; writing appears everywhere and spoils the effect of modern building and planning. The reasons given for this kind of attitude vary; things come too easy for young people; unemployment; decliningrole of the Church; poor parental influence; lack of discipline in schools. {Litter}is also a problem and cannot be blamed only on the young. All ages are guilty of showing how little they seem to care for the community's environment.
